original_text: And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.
korean_text: 그들이 큰 소리로 재촉하여 십자가에 못 박기를 구하니 그들의 소리가 이긴지라

sentences.original_text: And they were instant with loud voices
requiring that he might be crucified
And voices of them and of chief priests
